page.title: 12KINGMOOR FAMILY LIFE
page.content: {KINGMOOR FAMILY LIFE {Weekend (Anneliese Fletcher) We get up at 09.00 and after breakfast we go our separate ways. Dad usually reads a book, Mum cleans the house & I go outside.At 12.00 we have "Sunday lunch".After lunch we play games or go for a walk.At 05.00 we have tea,(sandwiches & cake).After tea I play outside & my Mum & Dad watch television.I come in at 08.00 and watch television until bedtime. {Weekday (Sarah Mason) } Every morning we get up early because my Dad has to go to work. He works in a bank. We have breakfast then he goes.We then go to school. My Mum goes to work in an Infant School. For lunch I stay at school.At school we do maths,English,art and music.At 03.00 we go home.After tea I go to Guides,then bed.
